entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Drifting snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
